interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Argan Magic Color Protection Hair Mask – Nourishes, Hydrates & Helps to Protect Color Treated Hair | Enriched with Moringa Oil & Botanical Extracts | Made in USA | Paraben Free | Cruelty Free (8 oz)
Review Date: 2021/03/03
Store: Argan Magic
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Argan Magic', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Material Feature': 'Natural, Cruelty Free, Paraben Free', 'Hair Type': 'Color Treated', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Package Dimensions': '4.45 x 4.09 x 3.43 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '605923470710'}
Review Text: Constantly color and using heat styling tools in my hair that using hair masks keeps my hair healthy and maintained. I use this hair mask that not only smells clean and refreshing after I shampoo my hair and I let it absorb for about 5 mins in a shower cap then I rinse it out. My hair feels so smooth and healthy!
Review Title: Great mask for color treated hair!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Natwag Makeup Remover Pads,18 Pack 3.74 Inch Reusable Microfiber Cleansing Pad with Laundry Bag Suitable for All Skin Types,3 Color Facial Cleansing Pad Set. Natwag {'Brand': 'Natwag', 'Skin Type': 'All Skin,Dry', 'Material Feature': 'Reusable', 'Unit Count': '18.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '18', 'Package Dimensions': '4.4 x 4.37 x 2.59 inches; 3.84 Ounces', 'UPC': '745103569701'} I strive to buy products that will cut costs in the long run but that also help the environment. I wear makeup every day and use cotton rounds to remove my makeup which can cost a lot overly time. I switched to these reusable wash pads and not only are they easy to hold because of the hook but they remove my makeup without being harsh on my skin. The wash bag makes it easy to just throw in the washer and protect the quality of the cloths just as I would use for delicates. Durable pads for everyday makeup use Amtidy Solid Color Vintage Modern Style Elastic Women's Rhinestone Crown Tiara, Bridal Wedding Dance Party Birthday Party Women's Headband Tiara, Queen Tiara With Comb（Silver） Amtidy {'Material': 'Rubber', 'Fabric Type': 'Elastic', 'Brand': 'Amtidy', 'Item Form': 'Spiral', 'Unit Count': '10.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '11.65 x 5.63 x 3.23 inches; 12.03 Ounces', 'UPC': '782931993780'} I love the variety of colors that can fit through the whole year. Living in Florida is very humid most of the year so having headbands to keep your hair away from your face but still adds style to your outfits. They are double lined and super stretchy. I love the vibrant colors and the warmer tones. Comfortable + great for all seasons BEYELIAN Lash Shampoo with Brush Eyelash Extension Cleanser Eyelid Foaming Cleanser Lash Foam Shampoo Makeup Remover - For Home & Salon Use BEYELIAN {'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 1.7 x 1.1 inches; 1.94 Ounces'} I’ve recently had lash extensions put on for the first time and it’s been an adjustment to care for them and find a product that doesn’t pull lashes while cleaning my makeup off. This is perfect for traveling or carrying in your purse! I highly recommend this because it doesn’t irritate my sensitive eyes and wipes away my makeup after one wash! Good lash cleaner! Facial Skincare,Cucumber Essence Hydrating Moisturizing Revitalizing Hydration Fruit Extract Deep Cleaning Facial Skincare Sheet for All Skin Type Care, 35ml/1.18oz, Pack of 5 PalNour {} Smells good and works wonders on your skin!

Having combination skin I lack moisture in my t-zone so this mask really helped to rehydrate my skin! Hydrating! Dr.Althea Multi-Action Infusion Serum - 56 Packets of Light weight Gel Serum Dr.Althea {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Dr.Althea', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Protein,Calluses,Anti-aging', 'Package Dimensions': '6.8 x 5.7 x 1.3 inches; 5.61 Ounces'} I’ve been carrying these individually packaged serums for after a workout. I’ve been wearing masks for long periods of time and I’ve noticed my skin needed a little tlc. I’ve been washing my face more times a day and applying this serum all over my face and neck. I’ve noticed my skin looks brighter and hydrated since using this product. Glowing skin! Multicolors Crimped Bobby Pins, 96 Counts 2 Inches Non Slip Grip Hair Pins For Women, Safe Rubber Tips & Strong Grip Bob Pins, Bobby Pins Blonde, Black, Brown, Green DARONGFENG {'Brand': 'DARONGFENG', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Color': 'Gray,Green,Brown', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Metal, Rubber', 'Package Dimensions': '4.8 x 3.8 x 0.7 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Hair pins-D96-4', 'UPC': '741416436082'} [[VIDEOID:2cdede7e71d7fcbe49c85fc3e6dd4373]] These Bobby pins are great to have if you want them to blend in with your hair color or give you a pop of color. I have almost jet black hair so using the gold Bobby pins with gold accessories looks really nice. Can’t wait to try different styles with the Bobby pins besides the cross cross I’ve been doing. Great variety pack! Empty Amber Glass Spray Bottles - (4 Pack) 16 oz with Labels Refillable Container for Essential Oils, Cleaning Solutions, Cleaning Products, Hair, Plant Mister, Daily Shower, Gardening or Aromatherapy AYL {'Brand': 'AYL', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Package Dimensions': '9.88 x 7.6 x 7.17 inches; 2.98 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'EmptyAmberGlassSprayBottles 4 Pack', 'UPC': '860005177202'} [[VIDEOID:c6772df5dbc6852104055655b1eb7]] These bottles are great for having a cohesive style of spray bottles for all of your home cleaning sprays. You can make your own labels with a label maker or even print some on a thicker paper and tape them to the bottles. I’ve been making my own sprays for cleaning using essential oils. I want to have more nautical products to deep clean my house. The lids are great for back up cleaning supplies and the funnel is so helpful for little to no waste. Great quality! Argan Magic Color Protection Hair Mask – Nourishes, Hydrates & Helps to Protect Color Treated Hair | Enriched with Moringa Oil & Botanical Extracts | Made in USA | Paraben Free | Cruelty Free (8 oz) Argan Magic {'Brand': 'Argan Magic', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Material Feature': 'Natural, Cruelty Free, Paraben Free', 'Hair Type': 'Color Treated', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Package Dimensions': '4.45 x 4.09 x 3.43 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '605923470710'} Constantly color and using heat styling tools in my hair that using hair masks keeps my hair healthy and maintained. I use this hair mask that not only smells clean and refreshing after I shampoo my hair and I let it absorb for about 5 mins in a shower cap then I rinse it out. My hair feels so smooth and healthy! Great mask for color treated hair!
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Eco-Conscious:** Maintains a strong preference for environmentally friendly products that highlight cost savings and sustainability.
- **Everyday Makeup User:** Incorporates makeup removal as part of daily routines, valuing practical and effective beauty accessories.
- **Preference for Reusability:** Shows a commitment to sustainable skincare and beauty practices by favoring reusable items.
- **Gentle on Skin:** Chooses products that are effective yet gentle, underscoring a concern for skin health and comfort.
- **Convenience Seeker:** Appreciates easy maintenance and versatile solutions suitable for various climates and seasons.
- **Positive Product Experience:** Often satisfied with product durability and effectiveness, gravitating towards reliable and highly rated options that blend functionality with style.
- **Recent Focus on Eye and Skin Care:** Demonstrated interest in products for eyelash care and hydrating solutions for combination skin, focusing on moisture balance and nurturing skin health.
- **Post-Workout Skin Care:** Engaged in skin care routines post-workout, utilizing lightweight serums to combat dryness and boost hydration.
- **Fashion-Forward:** Interested in stylish accessories, particularly hair items that complement various colors and styles, enhancing personal flair.
- **Home Care Enthusiast:** Emphasized a cohesive and sustainable approach to home management, investing in DIY cleaning solutions and aesthetically pleasing refillable containers.
- **Hair Care Advocate:** Recently highlighted a preference for hydrating products that support color-treated hair, enjoying effective treatments that maintain hair health, particularly after regular styling and coloring.

The user seamlessly integrates sustainability, convenience, effective skin-friendly solutions, and hair care into daily life while expressing a growing interest in home management and personal style.
